Metadata.Title: mark blark
Metadata.Description: eliminate these muffin workers protecting the CEO of the muffin buisness. the CEO is waiting on a speedboat because he wants to drive around, but when you get on the speedboat, knock him out and drive him to the facility.the muffin workers have also hired a private militia to hunt you down, and also the Operative's men are also hunting you down, so escape fast on this one, or the ark society will be a warzone.
